citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30am on 02-
DEC-22. The inspector spoke to the new occupants of the house who stated the licensee moved. The inspector also left
a message on the voicemail. There were no guinea pigs left at the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30am on 02-
DEC-22.  The inspector spoke to the new occupants of the house who stated the licensee moved.  The inspector also left 
a message on the voicemail.  There were no guinea pigs left at the facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
